characteristic.__text: Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Fyreslayers Priest^^** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **^^Fyreslayers^^** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.

Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target that friendly unit until the start of your next turn.
If the chanting roll was 8+, also subtract 1 fromthe Rend characteristic of attacks that target that friendly unit until the start of your next turn.
**^^Prayer^^**, **^^Unlimited^^**
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Fyreslayers Priest^^** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **^^Fyreslayers Infantry Hero^^** wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.

The target can use 2 **^^Fight^^** abilities this turn. After the first is used, however, the target has **^^Strike-last^^** for the rest of the turn.
If the chanting roll was 8+, also add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks for the rest of the turn.
**^^Prayer^^**
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Fyreslayers Priest^^** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **^^Magmadroth^^** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.

For the rest of the turn, the ‘Battle Damaged’ ability has no effect on the target and add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s **Companion** weapons.
If the chanting roll was 8+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s **Companion** weapons for every 4 damage points the target has.
**^^Prayer^^**
Add 1 to hit rolls for **Companion** weapons used by friendly **^^Fyreslayers^^** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.
Once Per Battle (Any Combat Phase)
Add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.
Once Per Battle, Enemy Hero Phase
Until the start of your next turn, friendly **^^Infantry^^** units cannot be targeted by shooting attacks while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.
Add 1 to save rolls for friendly **^^Infantry^^** units while they are wholly within friendly territory.
Add 2 to the Health characteristic of friendly Magmadroth units.
Add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **^^Fyreslayers Infantry^^** units that charged in the same turn.
Add 3 to the control scores of friendly **^^Fyreslayers Heroes^^**. In addition, the control scores of **^^Fyreslayers Heroes^^** cannot be modified by enemy abilities.
If this unit is not a **^^Priest^^**, they have **^^Priest (1)^^**. If this unit was already a **^^Priest^^**, add 1 to this unit’s chanting rolls.
Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly **^^Fyreslayers^^** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

If this unit is in combat with an enemy unit that has **^^Strike-first^^**, this unit has **^^Strike-first^^**. If this unit is in combat with an enemy unit that uses the ‘All-out Attack’ command, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s attacks for the rest of the turn
Your Hero Phase
If there is not a friendly **Zharrgron Flame-spitter** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **^^Fyreslayers Priest^^** to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Set up a **Zharrgron Flame-spitter** wholly within 12" of the chanter and visible to them.
**^^Prayer^^**, **^^Summon^^**
Your Hero Phase
If there is not a friendly **Molten Infernoth** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **^^Fyreslayers Priest^^** to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Set up a **Molten Infernoth** wholly within 12" of the chanter, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.
**^^Prayer^^**, **^^Summon^^**
Your Hero Phase
If there is not a friendly **Runic Fyrewall** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **Fyreslayers Priest** to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Set up a **Runic Fyrewall** wholly within 12" of the chanter and visible to them.
**^^Prayer^^**, **^^Summon^^**
Once Per Battle (Army), Any Hero Phase

You can only use this ability if you have not used any **^^Ur-gold Rune^^** abilities this battle round.
Friendly **^^Fyreslayers^^** units have **^^Ward (5+)^^** for the rest of the battle round.
**^^Ur-gold Rune^^**
Once Per Battle (Army), Your Shooting Phase

You can only use this ability if you have not used any **^^Ur-gold Rune^^** abilities this battle round.
Pick any number of enemy units within 10" of any visible friendly **^^Fyreslayers^^** units to be targets.
Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
**^^Ur-gold Rune^^**
Once Per Battle (Army), Your Charge Phase

You can only use this ability if you have not used any **^^Ur-gold Rune^^** abilities this battle round.
For the rest of the battle round, friendly **^^Fyreslayers^^** units have **^^Strike-first^^** while they are in combat with an enemy unit that charged in the same turn.
**^^Ur-gold Rune^^**
Once Per Battle (Army), Start of Any Turn

You can only use this ability if you have not used any **^^Ur-gold Rune^^** abilities this battle round.
Melee weapons used by friendly **^^Fyreslayers^^** units have **Crit (Mortal)** for the rest of the battle round.
**^^Ur-gold Rune^^**
Once Per Battle (Army), Start of Any Turn

You can only use this ability if you have not used any **^^Ur-gold Rune^^** abilities this battle round.
For the rest of the battle round, friendly **^^Fyreslayers^^** units have **^^Strike-first^^** while they are in combat with an enemy unit that charged in the same turn.
**^^Ur-gold Rune^^**
